wikipedia_page.main: Elen Gwdman (fl. 1616) was a Welsh female poet and writer of the early 17th-century. Very little is known of her life, but it is thought she may have belonged to a sub-branch of the Woods family from the Tal-y-llyn area, in Anglesey. Gwdman is a rare example of a female poet of the early modern period.

response: The poet Elen Gwdman (fl. 1609) came from here.
